title: Tu Beer Hai
episode_desc: Naveen is pissed off at his company for not letting him lead a project, for which he worked really hard. His mentor Bhati asks him a fundamental question 'What are you?'. Naveen and his friends discover the answer to it in different ways.
show_desc: A story of trials and tribulations of four young entrepreneurs who quit their day jobs in order to pursue their start up venture.

title: And Then There Were Four
episode_desc: While the whole idea of startup is of 3 friends. Naveen's roommate and IIM graduate Mandal want to enter the team and make the 3 realize why they need him.
show_desc: A story of trials and tribulations of four young entrepreneurs who quit their day jobs in order to pursue their start up venture.

title: The Jury Room
episode_desc: Now the team is united, ready for their start-up. But, Funding? Investors? Naveen and the guys go around the town looking for investors discovering the plethora of start-ups.
show_desc: A story of trials and tribulations of four young entrepreneurs who quit their day jobs in order to pursue their start up venture.

title: Bulb Jalega Boss
episode_desc: Naveen, Mandal and Yogi pick up from where they left off to make it or break it at the event under any circumstance, while Jeetu has an agenda of his own to take care at home. The events unfold parallel to each other.
show_desc: A story of trials and tribulations of four young entrepreneurs who quit their day jobs in order to pursue their start up venture.

title: Where Magic Happens
episode_desc: The Team get into a new problem when their idea is hacked by another team and they fight through emotions and misunderstandings to get what they rightfully deserve. Mandal steps up for the team and show his value to the team.
show_desc: A story of trials and tribulations of four young entrepreneurs who quit their day jobs in order to pursue their start up venture.
